verses.roman:
tomāra kavitva kichu śunite haya mana
kṛpā kari' kara yadi gaṅgāra varṇana

synonyms: tomāra—your; kavitva—poetic integrity; kichu—something; śunite—to hear; haya—becomes; mana—mind; kṛpā—mercy; kari'-showing Me; kara—you do; yadi—if; gaṅgāra—of mother Ganges; varṇana—description.
translation: "Therefore I desire to hear your skill in composing poetry. We could hear this if you would mercifully describe the glory of mother Ganges."
